document.full_text: the company that owns the applebee's restaurant chain said on monday it was immediately retraining its workers nationwide after a server at a suburban detroit location accidentally served alcohol to a toddler.
document.title: applebee's to retrain staff after mixed-drink mixup
lines_and_colors: the company that owns the applebee's restaurant chain said on monday it was immediately retraining its workers nationwide after a server at a suburban detroit location accidentally served alcohol to a toddler.
